description: Table for the intended recipient and relation of donor to the recipient.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: TX_DNR_REL_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item indicates how the donor is related to the intended recipient. E.g. "Parent" indicates that the donor is a parent to the recipient.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes
